item.title: Bitcoin.com Podcast: Simon Dixon Talks P2P Lending
item.description:
Bitcoin.com Podcast: Simon Dixon Talks P2P Lending

On the latest episode of the Bitcoin.com podcast, Simon Dixon rejoins our host, Zach Doty, to discuss Bitcoin P2P lending the new P2P lending app Also read: Russia U-Turn: Bitcoin Forex Trading to Be Legal, Mining Banned Credible Friends that Zach himself founded. Be sure to tune into the next episode of the Bitcoin.com Podcast!

item.title: Where Will Bitcoin Prices Go Post-Halving? Market Experts See Bullish Future - CoinDesk
item.description:
Where Will Bitcoin Prices Go Post-Halving? Market Experts See Bullish Future - CoinDesk

In the aftermath of bitcoin's 'halving' on 9th July, market experts have begun to take positions on whether they believe the digital currency's price will rise or fall in the weeks and months ahead.

item.title: A resolution calling for a pro-bitcoin national policy was just introduced in Congress. | Coin Center
item.description:
A resolution calling for a pro-bitcoin national policy was just introduced in Congress. | Coin Center

A resolution calling for a pro-bitcoin national policy was just introduced in Congress. The bi-partisan H.R. 835 was introduced by Rep. Adam Kinzinger and co-sponsored by Rep. Tony Cardenas.

item.title: Ether.Camp Announces $50,000 Contest to Build the next Killer Blockchain-Based Application - NEWSBTC
item.description:
Ether.Camp Announces $50,000 Contest to Build the next Killer Blockchain-Based Application - NEWSBTC

Press Release: The popular Ethereum blockchain explorer and smart contract analysis tool invites developers, entrepreneurs and enthusiasts to participate in their upcoming hackathon. July 19, 2016, Toronto, Canada - has announced the launch of its second annual hackathon. The popular Ethereum block explorer and smart contacts analysis tool provider invites everyone with the ...

item.title: Wine Boxes to Whatsapp: How Africa's Banks Are Going DIY to Test Ethereum - CoinDesk
item.description:
Wine Boxes to Whatsapp: How Africa's Banks Are Going DIY to Test Ethereum - CoinDesk

Members of six African banks reportedly met yesterday to discuss the next steps in their ongoing effort to connect aspects of the South African banking system via a private version of the ethereum blockchain, according to sources.

item.title: Breakout Gaming Adds BreakoutPvP eSports Site to Its Cryptocurrency Ecosystem - NEWSBTC
item.description:
Breakout Gaming Adds BreakoutPvP eSports Site to Its Cryptocurrency Ecosystem - NEWSBTC

Bitcoin Press Release: Breakout Gaming has announced the launch of its BreakoutPvP eSports platform as part of its cryptocurrency based gaming ecosystem built around the world's first 'multicurrency' Breakout Coin. July 19, 2016, San Jose, Costa Rica - Breakout Gaming has expanded its Breakout Coin (BRK) cryptocurrency distribution model by launching BreakoutPvP eSports platform for ...

item.title: 8.3K People Are Using IFTTT to Track Bitcoin Price
item.description:
8.3K People Are Using IFTTT to Track Bitcoin Price

Popular internet-based task automator IFTTT says over 8,300 of its users are using the service to record the bitcoin price every day in Google Spreadsheets. Also read: Turkish Residents Flock to Bitcoin During Military Coup It's a convenient way for bitcoiners to keep a historic record of BTC prices without having to manually watch and maintain a spreadsheet, or continually referring to bitcoin price charts on live data sites.

item.title: Bank of England Does the Groundwork for Central Bank Backed Digital Currency - NEWSBTC
item.description:
Bank of England Does the Groundwork for Central Bank Backed Digital Currency - NEWSBTC

The Bank of England has proposed the introduction of a central bank backed digital currency alongside fiat banknotes. Read more... The idea of creating a central bank backed digital currency is not a new thing. The digital currency community and central banks of various nations have floated this idea at one point or another.
